detaileddescription.para: Checks whether a PSBTInput is already signed by checking for non-null finalized fields.

memberdef.argsstring: (const PartiallySignedTransaction psbt, unsigned int input_index, const PrecomputedTransactionData *txdata)
memberdef.name: PSBTInputSignedAndVerified

detaileddescription.para: Checks whether a PSBTInput is already signed by doing script verification using final fields.
Counts the unsigned inputs of a PSBT.
Updates a PSBTOutput with information from provider.
This fills in the redeem_script, witness_script, and hd_keypaths where possible.
Compute a PrecomputedTransactionData object from a psbt.

memberdef.argsstring: (const SigningProvider &provider, PartiallySignedTransaction &psbt, int index, const PrecomputedTransactionData *txdata, std::optional< int > sighash, SignatureData *out_sigdata, bool finalize)
memberdef.name: SignPSBTInput

detaileddescription.para: Signs a PSBTInput, verifying that all provided data matches what is being signed.
txdata should be the output of PrecomputePSBTData (which can be shared across multiple SignPSBTInput calls). If it is nullptr, a dummy signature will be created.
Reduces the size of the PSBT by dropping unnecessary non_witness_utxos (i.e. complete previous transactions) from a psbt when all inputs are segwit v1.
Finalizes a PSBT if possible, combining partial signatures.

parameterdescription.para: PartiallySignedTransaction to finalize return True if the PSBT is now complete, false otherwise

detaileddescription.para: Finalizes a PSBT if possible, and extracts it to a CMutableTransaction if it could be finalized.

parameterdescription.para: CMutableTransaction representing the complete transaction, if successful

simplesect.para: True if we successfully extracted the transaction, false otherwise

detaileddescription.para: Combines PSBTs with the same underlying transaction, resulting in a single PSBT with all partial signatures from each input.

simplesect.para: True if we successfully combined the transactions, false if they were not compatible

briefdescription.para: Decode a base64ed PSBT into a PartiallySignedTransaction.
Decode a raw (binary blob) PSBT into a PartiallySignedTransaction.
